attributes.action: Reduce the prices of university fees.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students should be rewarded for going to university. University fees makes the cost of living expensive and possibly making Students break the law in order to pay fees. If the fees were cheaper, Students would be able to make life much better for themselves and would therefore make themselves more independant by being able to live without their parents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
